https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cay4qE79QEyDlvCmGSolVN6cxzt.jpg 7½ Phere: More Than a Wedding is a 2005 Bollywood comedy film directed by Ishaan Trivedi and produced by Sonal Malhotra and Nimit Modawal. It stars Juhi Chawla and Irfan Khan in lead roles. The film was released in India on 29 July 2005 with mixed response 7½ Phere
